name: Grumpy's Friendship Course
description:
Kirby's dream course is the #1 friendship killing strengthening game on the game grumps channel, so I decided to give it a little twist -your points go to your opponent instead of you!

That's right, your job is to help your buddy win, by collecting stars for them.

Either that or push the bastard into stars so you will get them. Your choice really.

Made for the 3rd Unofficial Game Grmps Game Jam

Comic Ink Font from https://www.dafont.com/comic-ink.font
